sentences.en: A moralist who preaches to people doesn't get anywhere ,'Mr. Hargrove says.

sentences.en: A statesman cannot afford to a moralist.

sentences.en: As he grew old, he turned into a crusty Confucian moralist.

sentences.en: He always fancied himself a moralist.
sentences.cn: 他总是认为自己是道德家.

sentences.en: The satisfaction derived from this act was all that the most ardent moralist could have desired.
sentences.cn: 这个行动使自己得到了连最热心的慈善家都希冀得到的满足.

sentences.en: You had better not to come the moralist with us.
